label: 神人
本: Land, Power, and the Sacred The Estate System in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 2018
著者: Goodwin, Janet R. (ed.)/ Piggott, Joan R. (ed.)
説明文: purveyors or functionaries who performed miscellaneous duties for important shrines; their duties ranged from money lending to rent collection to coercive enforcement. See kugonin, yoriudo.
